metadata.title: CVE-2022-30783 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An invalid return code in fuse_kern_mount enables intercepting oflibfuse-lite protocol traffic between NTFS-3G and the kernel in NTFS-3Gthrough 2021.8.22 when using libfuse-lite.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntfs-3g - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm3').
